title: Thunderbird mobile application
creator: nileshlalge7
content:
I have successfully export and import in thunderbird but unable to access my emails on mobile phone. Please find the attached screenshot where you can see my inbox.It is showing blank even refreshing multiple times. Could you please lrt me know solution over this. My mobile phone is Asus Zenfone Android version 9

Thank you

title: IMAP push not working, repeatedly
creator: home60
content: No matter what I do, Thunderbird refuses to push my imap email. I keep missing several important emails. Outlook, Spark both work fine but I hate the ads. Please help me figure out what's wrong. This makes the client unusable.
